description: Tony DiAngelo pauses: I wonder if Chase Hunter takes me for granted. Every time he comes home from the gym, he talks about all the hot men working out. One in particular, Scott Baldwin. I can't bear it as my imagination runs wild. I envision my Chase taking Scott and pummeling the jock's bubble butt with his huge cock, penetrating him deep and furiously. I get a knot in the pit of my stomach as I think about Chase with another man. It makes me crazy.
title: Hold Me Again
